Detailed Description

Definitions for SPE Elf handling.

Define Documentation

#define IS_CTK_ELF_CESOF ( handle   ) 

Value:

(CTK_ELF_CESOF(handle).handle_size == CTK_ELF_CESOF_HANDLE_SIZE && \
     IS_ELF(*(Elf32_Ehdr*)(CTK_ELF_CESOF(handle).elf_image)))

#define IS_ELF ( ehdr   ) 

Value:

((ehdr).e_ident[EI_MAG0] == ELFMAG0 && \
                         (ehdr).e_ident[EI_MAG1] == ELFMAG1 && \
                         (ehdr).e_ident[EI_MAG2] == ELFMAG2 && \
                         (ehdr).e_ident[EI_MAG3] == ELFMAG3)

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum ctk_elf_type_t

Elf image types

Enumerator:
CTK_ELF_TYPE_CESOF  CESOF Elf program handle
CTK_ELF_TYPE_MAPPED  Mapped Elf handle
CTK_ELF_TYPE_RAW  Raw Elf image
CTK_ELF_TYPE_INVALID  Invalid Elf type

Function Documentation

static int ctk_elf_check_type ( ctk_elf_handle_t *  elf_handle  )  [inline, static]

Quick-checks the elf image type

Parameters:
[in] elf_handle - Elf image handle
Returns:
one of either CTK_ELF_TYPE_CESOF, CTK_ELF_TYPE_RAW, or CTK_ELF_TYPE_MAPPED or CTK_ELF_TYPE_INVALID.

int ctk_elf_close_handle ( ctk_elf_handle_t *  elf_handle  ) 

Closes Elf program and frees the allocated resources.

Parameters:
[in] elf_handle - Elf image handle
Returns:
0 (CTK_SUCCESS) on success, errno (non-zero) on failure.

Returns pointer to the actual Elf raw image

Parameters:
[in] elf_handle - Elf image handle
Returns:
pointer to the Elf image. NULL if the given image is invalid.

int ctk_elf_load_image ( ctk_elf_handle_t *  elf_handle,
void **  load_image,
ctk_uint32_t *  load_size,
ctk_uint32_t *  load_addr,
ctk_uint32_t *  entry_point 
)

Allocates buffer and loads the given ELF image into the buffer

Parameters:
[in] elf_handle - ELF handle (CESOF program handle, Raw Elf image or Elf handle)
[in,out] load_image - load image (allocated by the callee if the given pointer is NULL. Be careful not to pass an invalid non-null pointer value)
[out] load_size - load image size
[out] load_addr - load start addr
[out] entry_point - program entry point
Returns:
0 (CTK_SUCCESS) on success, errno (non-zero) on failure.

const char *  filename 
)

Opens Elf file and returns the loaded Elf image.

Parameters:

[in] filename - file name
Returns:

int ctk_elf_verify_spe_image ( void *  elf_image  ) 

Verifies the SPE Elf image.

Parameters:
[in] elf_image - pointer to the raw Elf image
Returns:
0 (CTK_SUCCESS) if the given ELF is valid, errno (non-zero) otherwise.
